text: The Castilla y León Cup 2009–10 (Spanish: Copa Castilla y León 2009–10) is the first edition of this football trophy in its renewed version after the regional championships celebrated between 1925 and 1931 and the 1985 summer trophy. ==Teams participants== * Real Valladolid (started at the semi-finals) * Numancia * UD Salamanca * Cultural Leonesa * Ponferradina * Zamora * Guijuelo * Palencia * Mirandés * Burgos * Arandina * Atlético Bembibre * Real Ávila (withdrew by financial problems) * Gimnástica Segoviana (withdrew by financial problems) ==Financial problems== The economic situation of Real Ávila and Gimnástica Segoviana provoked their withdrew of the tournament in July. To refill again the tournament, Castilla y León Football Federation called Atlético Bembibre. The tournament has, at the end, twelve clubs, eleven of which took part in the group stage. ==Group stage== *All times are CEST ===Group A=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width="175"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left|UD Salamanca |2||2||0||0||5||2||+3||6 |- |align=left|Guijuelo |2||1||0||1||5||4||+1||3 |- |align=left|Zamora |2||0||0||2||1||5||−4||0 |- |} ===Group B=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width="175"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left|Arandina |3||2||1||0||10||0||+10||7 |- |align=left|Burgos |3||1||1||1||1||9||−8||4 |- |align=left|Numancia |3||0||3||0||0||0||0||3 |- |align=left|Mirandés |3||0||1||2||0||2||−2||1 |- |} ===Group C=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width="175"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left|Palencia |3||3||0||0||7||1||+6||9 |- |align=left|Ponferradina |3||2||0||1||7||4||+3||6 |- |align=left|Cultural Leonesa |3||0||1||2||1||4||−3||1 |- |align=left|Atlético Bembibre |3||0||1||2||2||8||−6||1 |- |} ===Final Phase=== ====Draw==== {| class="wikitable" |- !width="200"|Team No. 1 !Score !width="200"|Team No. 2 |- |align="right"|Winners Group C |align="center" rowspan="2"|vs. |align="left"|Real Valladolid |- |align="right"|Winners Group B |align="left"|Winners Group A |- |} ====Semi-finals==== ====Final==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- !Castilla y León Cup 2009–10 Winners |- |UD Salamanca 1st Title |} ==References== Category:Castilla y León Cup Category:2009–10 in Spanish football cups
